casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Appellee, v. Salvatore LOMBARDINO, William Farinella, and Joseph Gerace, Appellants. No. 7342. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. May 23, 1940. Anthony A. Calandra, of Newark, N. J., for appellants. William F. Smith, Acting U. S. Atty., and Thorn Lord, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Trenton, N. J., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, MARIS, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgments of the district court are affirmed, the mandate to issue forthwith.
